channel.title: Need help with cache
channel.description:
how do i get the cache do auto download when they download the client from the internet? :confused:
its 317 Pi

item.title: Need help with cache
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Goto your Client.java and in your startup method add this code:

Save and close and now open up Signlink.java and search for code:

public static String findcachedir() { return "./Cache/"; }

Change it to code:

public static final String findcachedir() { String s; String s1; File file; s = "c:/.YourclientName_Cache/"; s1 = ""; file = new File((new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).toString()); if(file.exists() || file.mkdir()) { return (new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).append("/").toString(); } return null; }

Change the link and Cache name. Compile and your done.

Read full topic
